effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.x_y: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

flavor_text.x_y: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
